    <facet>

      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lom.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:aspect.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_f8e9b9bc0ae7772c80eb5dfe1fb415e3f9fb1a06</entry>

            <catalog>CUP</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_f8e9b9bc0ae7772c80eb5dfe1fb415e3f9fb1a06</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Ray tracing of reflection angles</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Strahlverfolgung der Reflexion Winkel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Traçage de rayon des angles de réflexion</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Traçado do raio de ângulos da reflexão</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Tracciato del raggio degli angoli di riflessione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επισήμανση του Ray των γωνιών αντανάκλασης</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Trazo del rayo de los ángulos de la reflexión</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows incident light rays striking a mirror at different angles. This can be used as a ray tracing exercise.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">light</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">mirror</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">ray tracing</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">rays</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">reflected angle</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt Ereignis die hellen 
Strahlen, die einen Spiegel in den unterschiedlichen Winkeln 
anschlagen. Dieses kann als verfolgenübung des Strahls 
verwendet werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre à incident les rayons 
légers heurtant un miroir à différents angles. Ceci peut 
être utilisé comme exercice traçant de rayon.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra a incident os raios 
claros que golpeiam um espelho em ângulos diferentes. Isto pode
ser usado como um exercício seguindo do raio.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra ad avvenimento i raggi
luminosi che colpiscono uno specchio agli angoli differenti. 
Ciò può essere usata come esercitazione seguente del raggio.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει συναφείς ελαφριές 
ακτίνες που χτυπούν έναν καθρέφτη στις διαφορετικές γωνίες. 
Αυτό μπορεί να χρησιμοποιηθεί ως άσκηση επισήμανσης 
ακτίνων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra a incidente los rayos 
ligeros pulso un espejo a diversos ángulos. Esto se puede 
utilizar como ejercicio que rastrea del rayo.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Licht</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Spiegel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Strahlverfolgung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Strahlen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">miroir</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">traçage de rayon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">rayons</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
